title: Make caption and comment with English ver. 出post同回覆都盡量連英文翻譯

replies.msg:
唔洗話一定要譯到一撚樣，但如果自問英文唔叻既無信心既，走去google translation，再執下佢，認同既幫手置頂希望外國媒體入到黎都知我地係到討論啲乜野，好彩既可以比佢地cap到圖放上佢地啲新聞

Just translate the meaning in English for foreign media easy reference. If you are not good in English, you may go to google to translate the Chinese in English. Push this post if you agree with that, hope that the foreign media can directly quote the message from LIHKG/hongkonger and to increase the exposure.

推一野訓，聽日再推

push and go to sleep, continue tomorrow

［全部人同我入黎］《致眾表》望各位香港市民出自己的一份綿力
https://lih.kg/1532967
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
推上去

全城開twitter account，將#chinazi推上worldwide trends!!!

Push push push

全城開twitter account，將#chinazi推上worldwide trends!!!

replies.msg:
The comment in English:-

Register your twitter account and push the #chinazi towouldwide trends!!!

【Message promotion】Circulate that message to worldwide！ The Chinese Communist Party will become the second Nazi Party！
-Share from LIHKG Forum
https://lih.kg/dNQaNS

The comment in English version:-

Please do not make the student's strike like a Carnival
https://lihkg.com/thread/1533422/page/1

點解要有英文？因為一黎可以直接share去Twitter同retwitte，外國媒體可以直接入黎就睇到寫乜野，更明白香港發生緊啲乜事同香港人既意願

The reason why English caption is needed, you can share the LIHKG post direct to Twitter if the post with and the foreign media will have well understanding to our situation and our mutual will when they click in to LIHKG post.

開3個新台

- 徵求翻譯台
- English Channel [英文台]
- Other Languages Channel [外文台]

"徵求翻譯台"
內 Post 需要找人翻譯的文章, 最好指明想要的語言
甚至 "文宣" 內容也可以
在回覆內 Post 各種話言的文字翻譯

"英文台" "外文台"
Post 已翻譯的文章
可能要在標題加 Tag, 分話言 e.g. [Francais] [Deutsch]

replies.msg:
Request LIHKG admin to creat 3 new topic sections for discussion
-Translation requisition section
-English channel
-Other Languages Channel

Translation requisition section
Post the request for translation, mainly fromChinese to English, people can also help translate the reply in English

English Channel and Other Language Channel
The post inside was duly translated to the appropriate language

推呀屌你老母
Push push push, mother fucker

屌，無人幫我推

Fuck that, just me pushing the post

推呀屌你老母
Push push push, mother fucker

十分同意, 我們要勾結外國勢力, 沒有英文又係好有難度, 再者叫別人用雞雞 TRANSLATE, 只亦會譯到不倫不類

totally agree with your opinion. We need to connect with foreigners by including english message. Google translate is not so highly reliable at all.
